headline: International Flavors Q4 Earnings Miss Estimates, Sales Dip Y/Y

headline: IFF Q4 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Operator: At this time, I would like to welcome everyone to the International Flavors & Fragrances Inc. Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Earnings Conference Call.  With me on the call today is our CEO, Jon Erik Fyrwald, and our CFO, Michael Deveau.

headline: Is Q4 2025 Profit Amid Lower Sales Altering The Investment Case For International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF)?
summary: International Flavors & Fragrances Inc. has reported past fourth-quarter 2025 results showing sales of US$2,589 million, down from US$2,771 million a year earlier, with net income improving to US$18 million from a net loss of US$60 million. For full-year 2025, sales eased to US$10.89 billion from US$11.48 billion while the company moved from net income of US$263 million to a net loss of US$374 million, highlighting pressure on profitability despite the quarter’s return to positive...
